Address.Address1: COMPASS HOTELS LTD- STANSTED TOLLGATE HOUSE 69-71 HIGH STREET

Description.Text: The Best Western Stansted Manor Hotel is conveniently located three miles from the terminal building of the London Stansted International Airport. Set back from the road, on the outskirts of the village of Birchanger and on 8 acres of metropolitan greenbelt land. The hotel is out of the airport flight path and on one mile from Junction 8 of the M11 motorway. An ideal location for the business or leisure traveller, our attentive staff will ensure a warm welcome is given. Modern spacious rooms afford a comfortable environment in which to relax and prepare for your onward journey or business meeting. The Best Western Stansted Manor Hotel offers all day dining in our restaurant with Brasserie-style menu and 24-hour room service is also available.
Set in 8 acres of green Woodland, 3 miles distance and 5 to 10 minutes drive to and from Stansted Airport Terminal building. Just off Junction 8 of the M11.

The rooms are traditional in style, pleasing to the eye and well finished. The beds warrant a special mention, each one is custom made to order and should guarantee a good nights sleep. Bathrooms are small but in good condition and all have a power shower.
The Hotel is a modern low-rise building situated in its own grounds.

The Restaurant is situated adjacent to the Lobby and is bright and spacious, on the sidewall of the restaurant is a conservatory, which runs the full length of the Restaurant. The Restaurant serves a wide variety of British Cuisine. Traditional and Contemporary tastes are well catered for. It will be closed for lunch and dinner from the 24th December and the 4th January due to limited service during Christmas period.
The hotel has a large lobby, which is centrally located within the building. It is bright spacious and well appointed
